title: Part B
stimulusHtml:
Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples and to score the response.

Note: Consistency can be shown by using specific values for A and C noted in part (a), or reasoning from other values used in part (a) (e.g., A is less than point X that I used, and C is greater than point Y; my values in part (a) show that temperature increases from A to C).
